Name: HMS Oswald
Displacement:
1,781 long tons (1,810 t) (surfaced)
2,030 long tons (2,060 t) (submerged)
Propulsion:
Diesel-electric
2 × Vickers diesel engines
2 × electric motors
2 screws
Speed:
17.5 knots (32.4 km/h; 20.1 mph) (surfaced)
9 knots (17 km/h; 10 mph) (submerged)
Range:
8,400 nmi (15,600 km; 9,700 mi) at 10 knots (19 km/h; 12 mph) (surfaced)
70 nmi (130 km; 81 mi) at 4 knots (7.4 km/h; 4.6 mph) (submerged)
Armament:
8 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes (6 bow, 2 stern) with 16 reloads
1 × QF 4-inch (102 mm) Mk XII deck gun
2 × Lewis machine guns
